column1: Associated with Ventnor Park Climatological Station at different site
Data on Ventnor Park climat. Station is now from this Cemetery site
1934 Oct 31st Inspection. Gauge very old and out of shape. New gauge recommended
1935 June 18th Inspection. Gauge worn out. New gauge and 2 measures supplied
1946 Total adjusted by 0.01 to correct sum
1955 May 10th Inspection. Site considered unsatisfactory because of over sheltering
